page.title: 20HENRY SMITH'S SCHOOL.
page.content: The school is divided into three site- s,namely King Oswy Site,St Peter's si- te and the Humanitites block.I do not frequently use the St Peter's site as it is mainly for older pupils.The sch- ool has a wind band which has done we- ll in competitions and an orchestra w- hich has been formed recently.Henry S- miths have several sports teams inclu- ding football,rugby,athletics and swi- mming which all take part in local competitions.I am in the athletics sw- imming and rugby teams.The school has a lot of leisure amenitites for pupils to use in there leisure time e.g. Swi- mming Baths,Discos,a computer club,and Chess Club.There is a disco for years 1,2,and 3 at Christmas. Pupils also frequently go on trips out of School to places like the theatre.There is also a sports hall to play football,b- asketball,or other sports in.K.CHYNE13
